mapper.update: update course set courseStatus=#{sign} where courseId=#{id};
update course set courseClass=1010 where courseId=#{id};
update course set heat=heat+1 where courseId=#{courseId};
mapper.select: select * from course where courseId=#{courseId} and teacherId=#{teacherId};
select * from course where courseId=#{courseId} and courseStatus=1;
select * from course where courseStatus!=3 and teacherId=#{teacherId};

select * from course c left join teacher_basic_information t on c.teacherId=t.teacherId where c.courseId like "%${key}%" or c.courseName like "%${key}%" or c.teacherId like "%${key}%" or t.teacherName like "%${key}%" or c.courseClass like "%${key}%" or c.courseStatus like "%${key}%" limit #{startPage},#{pageSize};
select * from course where courseName like "%${key}%" and courseStatus=1 limit #{startPage},#{pageSize};
select * from course where courseStatus=1 and courseId=#{courseId};
select * from course where courseStatus=1 order by heat limit #{amount};
select * from course where courseStatus=1 order by courseId limit #{amount};
